items.title: Warren Buffett Sold $133 Billion Worth of Stocks in 2024: Here Are 2 He's Not Selling
items.description: Through the first nine months of 2024, Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway unloaded $133 billion worth of stocks.  Buffett reduced Berkshire's massive stake in Apple and sold nearly a quarter of its Bank of America holding.  In the third quarter, Apple, American Express (NYSE: AXP), Bank of America, and Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) made up 70% of Berkshire's $271 billion stock portfolio.

items.title: This Top Warren Buffett Stock Could Soar Even Higher in 2025. Time to Buy?
items.description: Excluding the stock positions Buffett trimmed throughout 2024, this is by far the famed investor's biggest bet.

items.title: QMOM: Compelling For Swing-Trading, Not For The Long Term
items.description: QMOM ETF holds 50 trending stocks, with a focus on mid-caps, consumer discretionary and industrials. Read more to see my recommendation for the fund.
